tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recipes (
    recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_name TEXT,
    ingredient_list TEXT[],
    preparation_steps TEXT[],
    difficulty_level INT,
    nutrition_info TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE nutrition (
  nutrition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_id INT,
  calories INT,
  protein INT,
  carbs INT,
  fat INT
);
